content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
* System *

  • The Z Garbage Collector (ZGC) of Java 21 is now used by default (see
    also https://wiki.openjdk.org/display/zgc). This should work uniformly
    on all platforms, but requires a reasonably new version of Windows
    (Windows 10 or Windows Server 2019).

This refers to Isabelle/1a4be2516f50.

I've been testing this locally for quite some time, now it is the default.
Technically, it has become possible, because our old Windows Server 2012
(vmnipkow9) has been discontinued.

Makarius
